Articles.Content:
So, I am back. (you can run but you cannot hide! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) )

Since my last post about a year or more ago... I have moved house AND gotten married again.

In all that time, I have been playing KSP, I even have a mun base now of sorts. 

So, I hope to interact with the community more often now since 1.0 came out (and the better 1.2) because, NOW.... no more frustration with broken saves due to updates.

I even purchased a faster computer JUST for this game, a quad core, I could have gone faster, but its still better than a dual core I was playing KSP on.

Any how... I am back. A special note to the authors, and Mod authors. ~~~ Seriously, I love you all! Your rock my Kerbal world! ~~~

![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Welcome back, dont forget to give your love the required attention aside KSP, i tell you from experience ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Most important thing in my life aside my love was allways a supersupersuperfast PC, then work, eat, sleep, and all the other things that come around.

Have a good time!

> 
> Welcome back, dont forget to give your love the required attention aside KSP, i tell you from experience ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
> Most important thing in my life aside my love was allways a supersupersuperfast PC, then work, eat, sleep, and all the other things that come around.
> 
> Have a good time!

Oh, I do, that is why my KSP is often taking a back seat, Valentina has been on the Mun for ages because I haven't had the time, but as a side note, my new wife, Rianne, absolutely LOVES the adventures of KSP... soon, she will be starting her own game (so even less time for me to play, but hey, sharing the love of KSP is a good thing!)

> 
> Welcome back!
> We've been waiting!

If only you knew... I sort of left under a cloud last time, due to my diabetes being out of control (but not now) so my posts were very inflammatory... but that is all in the past now. So, starting afresh as they say.

Thanks for the welcome back guys. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-21T07:07:13Z" title="06/21/2015 07:07  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 21, 2015</time> by kiwi1960**

> 
> If only you knew... I sort of left under a cloud last time, due to my diabetes being out of control (but not now) so my posts were very inflammatory... but that is all in the past now. So, starting afresh as they say.
> Thanks for the welcome back guys. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Long gone, and best forgotten.

> 
> Long gone, and best forgotten.

Damn, where's the LIKE button on these forums. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Rep button? Bottom of post, the little star icon.
I was being ...silly. Comes from lurking far too long on FarceBook. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
